alert.note: Alert for Riverside; San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 16 at 6:05PM PDT until August 16 at 7:15PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR RIVERSIDE AND SAN BERNARDINO COUNTIES... At 605 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms produced heavy rain across the warned area earlier. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Riverside and San Bernardino Counties This includes the following highways... CA Route 177 between mile markers 20 and 24. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
